Articles.Content:
just found this thread very late klast night early moring

and than came back on this afternoon and went researching for it yet again finally did refind it

so registered and i think i am on it now!

so will begin by saying greetings to all thos scifi doctorwho fans and other scifi shows as well

of which i am fans of as well

so will try to get off to a hopefully very good beginning

i will try to jump right in with some idea's that have been festering for quite sometime

and very hopefully other's just might agree and wish to finally do something about fan stuff!

more later

i think this forum has great hope

hope it does continue!

again jay the eleventhdr

oh and by the way i did choose this name back when paul mccann was the doctor the eighth doctor so have had this name for awhile

Dr Who, a great series. BTY, someone has modded the Torus for use in KSP.

Start out with simple designs, learn how to get into orbit, then learn how to get into orbit with less fuel. Expand to lunar, then interplanetary missions. Perfect landing on Mun and other celestial bodies. Get your crafts to return back to Kerbal. Then, you are ready for your Kerbal astronauts to go exploring on their own.
